description: The Man Facepalming, Type-6 emoji is a sequence of the  Face Palm,  Emoji Modifier Fitzpatrick Type-6, ? Male Sign and ? Variation Selec
apple_vendor_description: The man facepalming emoji, as seen on Apple devices, features a deeply expressive representation of frustration or disbelief with a rich, dark skin tone. Apple's signature glossy shading and soft rounded edges give the figure a palpable sense of weariness, with the hand covering the face conveying a universal gesture of exasperation or mortification. This emoji is frequently employed in digital communication to signify overwhelming situations, silly mistakes, or moments of profound regret.
